experience: You and Binay both know Jennifer Jones and Kenneth Ervin Young
Chief Strategist, Communications Coach & Media Trainer
Galaxy Six Strategies: Foodily, TreeRing, Plum District, Mozilla, BabyCenter

Galaxy Six Strategies is a high-touch boutique firm focused on message delivery and communications coaching for speaking events and media interviews.Specialties and Services include: - media and speaker training, 1:1 coaching and group sessions- communications program development- messaging and public relations workshops- company/product positioning- content marketing- social media
Bacon and Broccoli = Nutrition in Balance

Leveraging two decades of media experience and expertise in nutrition, Curtis offers individual nutrition consulting and corporate workshops through her other company, Bacon and Broccoli. She fills a sweet spot in helping companies create clear communication around nutrition and lifestyle programs, and helping individual clients cut through the confusing health information so prevalent today to gain a better understanding of key nutritional concepts.
Led all public relations efforts through dot-com boom and bust. Served as the company spokesperson, and integrated marketing and public relations activities.
NRW: Apple, Yahoo!, E-Loan and PlanetRx

- Worked with Steve Jobs on national broadcast interviews for launch of iMac in 1998.- Media Trained Founders of Yahoo!, E-Loan and PlanetRx. - Managed national broadcast opportunities for Yahoo! Founders, Jerry Yang and David Filo. - Developed broadcast programs for NRW including media training, video news releases and satellite media tours for booming Internet companies.
Developed national and local market media tours, satellite tours, desk side briefings, corporate videos and video news releases (VNRS). Supervised celebrities and spokespeople on tours.
Newspaper Editor, Magazine Reporter, Health Writing & Journalism

summary: With a specialty in media and speaker training, Binay is the CEO of Galaxy Six Strategies where she has coached numerous C-level execs, VCs and spokespeople from the nation's top private and public companies in the finance, food, health and technology sectors. Her clients include BabyCenter, Banc of America Securities, Fenwick & West, Mozilla, Plum District and OpenTable. Curtis leads workshops in Media Training, Speaker Training and Executive Presence. For Binay’s insights on the media world today, please follow her @galaxysix and for nutrition and practical tips follow her @baconandbroc.
name: Binay (Cahn) Curtis
title: CEO, Entrepreneur: Galaxy Six Strategies and Bacon + Broccoli
